component.name: PianoCheetah
component.summary: Steve's weird midi sequencer for playing pop songs on piano n drum

description.p: - It's for playing a song on piano and drums. And practicing. - Show notes in a "pianoroll" format that's a little bit fancy. - You practice the piano parts and the bass and vocals sync to your tempo. - NOT a daw!! We're here to get a take, not to mix down. - Getting a song into your head and fingers is the aim.
